Address: 49 Bay Shore Avenue Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
The Coastal Lifestyle
Overlooking the Golf Course and immaculately presented, this spacious family home offers excellent value for the discerning buyer. Only minutes to the boat ramps and close to all amenities, you'll love being only a short walk to the Clifton Springs waterfront.
Spacious 'L' shaped lounge/dining features wood heater.
Original kitchen with dishwasher overlooks meals/family area
Three large bedrooms with robes and a study/fourth bedroom
Master bedroom with en-suite. Updated family bathroom
Gas ducted heating and reverse cycle cooling
Huge undercover alfresco area opens to a good size rear yard
Large garage with workshop and a carport for extra parking
Established low maintenance gardens
Ideal investment property or holiday abode
Easy access to the bowls club, golf course, and boat ramps

Description:
Quality, Style and Space
This home is stylish, generously proportioned and located in a convenient and popular spot. Big enough for the whole family, it will also appeal to anyone who appreciates, quality and style. With three separate living zones, there is plenty of room to relax and enjoy your own space. The open plan living area is a highlight; it features an impressive kitchen with an oversize walk in pantry, Caesarstone bench tops and an island breakfast bar. The adjacent study and large laundry are both located to make life simple and easy. From the meals area, timber framed bi-fold doors open up the space to the outdoors for easy entertaining. A separate sitting room offers the perfect quiet zone or formal lounge.
There are four bedrooms in total including a spacious master suite with walk-in robe and en-suite with double vanity. The three additional bedrooms have built in robes and are clustered around a family sized bathroom. Other features include ducted heating and evaporative cooling, generous storage and an elegant decor. The established gardens are fully fenced and easy care and the rear hardwood deck is ideal for sunny evening BBQs. A double lock up garage is also included.
You will enjoy the effortless access to the park and walkways that are almost on the doorstep, and you will love the convenience of being just a few minutes from Gateway Plaza. Ocean and harbour side beaches, rail trail and wineries are just a few of the local highlights. Welcome home to smart and easy living.

Description:
Stunning custom home with panoramic views.
Situated on an elevated block with stunning views over the bay, this quality, custom-built residence is sure to impress from the moment you set foot inside.
With luxury finishes, this remarkable property offers 27 Squares (approx.) of modern living, three spacious bedrooms with easy conversion to fourth, 2 bathrooms, with Spa-bath in main, all controlled through a state-of-the-art C-BUS system that operates all lights, blinds (in main living area), surround sound in all rooms, and impressive mood and night lighting controlled centrally on the touch display or with the individual LCD switches.
Upstairs, the sleek kitchen offers waterfall stone benches, stainless European appliances, and is accompanied by an expansive living area that opens through triple stacking doors to a large deck, with sweeping views of pristine waters, the Geelong City lights and the picturesque You Yangs, perfect for year-round entertainment.
The opulent master suite has been cleverly designed and features a large dressing room complete with built-in cabinetry, as well as a luxurious ensuite and a private deck with access to the kitchen.
Family and guests will be spoilt downstairs with 2 spacious bedrooms serviced by a grand central bathroom, as well as a large living area, bar with sink and a private deck.
Notable Features Include:
- Gleaming Tasmanian oak floors and staircase.
- Oversized double garage with, TV point and speakers.
- Established and landscaped gardens.
- Split systems in upstairs living and main bedroom.
- Ducted heating throughout.
- Ducted vacuum system with sweep point in the kitchen.
- Video doorbell with feed to kitchen and CCTV recording.
- Side access for boat or caravan.
Located just a short drive away from the Bellarines finest Schools, famous wineries, Clifton Springs Golf Club, or the local boat ramp and shops. Just 15 minutes to Leopolds Gateway Plaza, and 25 minutes to the Geelong CBD, this location is certainly one of the golden pockets of the Bellarine Peninsula.

Description:
THIS VILLA GLEAMS, AS NEW, JUST WALK TO TOWN.
Light and bright downsizer, a stylish design with low maintenance and so easy to relax and enjoy your new home. The open plan area includes large living with dining and well equipped kitchen with doors opening to the undercover outdoor patio. Three bedrooms, master with ensuite and WIR, the other two have BIR'S, central bathroom, laundry, separate toilet and large utility room for additional storage. Features include central heating, split system, walk in pantry, linen cupboard, quality fittings throughout, dishwasher and more. Spacious double garage with room for workbench and more storage, space for freestanding vehicles outside. A low maintenance garden with water tank and garden shed. A real beauty for the astute buyer, we can even talk quality furniture.
THERE ARE CURRENTLY NO PUBLIC OPEN HOMES SCHEDULED.
Please call the agent to book a private inspection.

Description:
Townhouse on Separate Title
Often sought, but rarely found, is a 2 bedroom townhouse such as this on its own separate title (no owner's corp). Well cared for and updated with new carpets throughout, this quality built home is ideal as a low maintenance investment, or for downsizers looking for privacy and security with just the right amount of garden to enjoy. Built at the rear of the block it has its own driveway to a remote-controlled single drive through garage, with space for a trailer/small caravan. The home has a generous kitchen with a spacious open plan living area includes a R/C air conditioner with sliding doors to a lovely undercover area and courtyard. Call now - this is one not to be missed.

Description:
Modern Delight on 650m2
A sublime fusion where comfortable and contemporary meets convenience and practicality. No stone left unturned with this chic renovation, allowing the new owners to move in and enjoy every aspect this home has to offer.
A compact footprint yet free flowing and astute; comprising 3 bedrooms, all equipped with built-in-robes and 2 with ceiling fans. A central two-way bathroom with access from the main bedroom, including floor to ceiling tiles, shower niches, timber vanity, heated towel rail, backlit vanity and deep bath. A beautiful light filled living area that veers into a study/reading nook with access to the lush galley kitchen. The kitchen has been decked out with induction cooking, 40ml stone benchtops and soft close drawers overlooking the dining with views of the garden. A separate toilet and laundry complete this neat and tidy package.
In a court location, the home is a delight but, it is the outside component that makes this package even more lucrative. There is room to park cars or a caravan in the front yard plus a double lock up carport (remote entry) that has through access into the yard where you will find an oversized garage that includes, power, work bench, storage space and small wood heater. A divine undercover area that has been tiled for appeal and ease, with fitted café blinds and timber double gates leading to the garden, a fantastic entertaining area that can be utilised in so many ways and, the serene garden which offers complete Zen. Lush green grass, decade old established trees, planter boxes, garden shed, timber shed, water tanks, and a private deck to lose yourself in a good book or sunbake in private.
Features of the home include, split system heating and cooling, wood heater, ample storage, ceiling fans and established gardens.
This home has so much going for it, including the fantastic location being minutes to the Bay, Beacon Point Reserve, public transport and a short drive to the main township.
Situated upon 650m2 this stunning package will be popular amongst first home buyers, investors and downsizers alike.
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
Your own private sanctuary.
This lovely 3 bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse with SLUG on 343m2 would make an ideal first home, downsizer or investment. Located in Leopold in a quiet court it really offers a private sanctuary to enjoy. With the master bedroom at the front, an open plan kitchen, dining and lounge towards the middle and the remaining 2 bedrooms, central bathroom and laundry at the rear it offers a comfortable and easy layout. The open plan kitchen, dining and lounge are the hub of the home. This light filled space looks out on the rear yard which has hedging for additional privacy, lawn and low maintenance garden. This really is a fantastic package and one that won't last so be quick to inspect!

Address: 8 Corio Bay Court Clifton Springs VIC 3222
Description:
Breathtaking Panorama!
The breathtaking panorama viewed from this outstanding property could be mistaken for the French Riviera or numerous sought after locations across the globe. Dreamed of by many but appreciated by the lucky few. Located in the prestigious High Ridge Estate Clifton Springs with incredible bay and rural views. This stylish contemporary home has blended beautifully with its rural and coastal surroundings. Nestled in established garden settings in a secluded court position. Act quickly to secure the prospect of calling this amazing property your own.
- Location, location central to the Bellarine Peninsula
- Walking distance to sheltered swimming spots
- Beautiful, unique vistas upstairs and downstairs with a north facing aspect to warm and lighten this amazing home
- Sprawling living spaces with cosy, intimate corners throughout
- Showcase picture window that captures the magic of Corio Bay, the You Yangs and the rural Bellarine Hills
- Private retreat for the home owner which includes a master suite with shower room, spacious WIR, study nook, library and private balcony.
- Quality timber parquetry flooring
- Elevated kitchen the centre hub of the living area with SS appliances, ample cupboards and views
- Wine cellar
- Protected entertaining deck, private guest room with ensuite and adjacent gym
- Stylishly renovated main bathroom with stand alone bathtub
- Minor bedrooms share a private 2-way ensuite
- Stand alone 6.5m x 6.5m approx brick workshop/ double garage
- Heated swim spa and tennis court
- Water tanks with approx 50,000 litre capacity
- Double glazing, split systems, gas log fire, solid fuel heater
- Over height double garage with 3m x 4.5m remote door
Private inspections only, call the agent to discuss this fantastic property !

Description:
Private, Quiet and Ready for You to Buy it!
Located in a quiet court, this private three bedroom double-brick home has all the bells and whistles for the first home buyer or the astute investor.
Timber paneling & brickwork are a feature in the spacious living area with exposed beams, split system air conditioning & mains gas wall heater.
Step into the expansive dining room and kitchen area. Polished tiles, laminate benchtops, gas cooktop & oven, offering plenty of cupboard space for pots, pans or anything else you may need.
Comprising 3 bedrooms plus a study. All bedrooms have built in robes & each is climate controlled by their own split system air-conditioner. Master bedroom with direct access to the updated bathroom.
A terrific backyard set on a large 599 sqm (approx) allotment.

Description:
The Great Escape
There is a certain charm only found in weather board houses, a warmth of a loved family home with a gaslog fireplace to high vaulted timber ceilings. This house is a home with a special ambience.
Getaway from it all & enjoy your own idyllic world. A commanding entertainment balcony overlooks your private backyard.
A secluded side entry is a doorknockers nightmare, while the split level design separates the three upper level bedrooms from the main living level.
Stepping down to the main living room as it opens up to the modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances including a 900 mm oven & double fridge cavity. White sleek lines, composite stone bench tops & a window looking out to the balcony makes this kitchen a joy to entertain.
Step out onto the modern full length balcony & get down to some serious entertaining or take the time to relax.
The lower level is ideally suited for co-habitation if you require; with a living / rumpus room with external access to a paved undercover entertaining area; a large master bedroom with ensuite.
A secluded backyard with ample lawn & well designed garden beds, there is even room for a chookpen.
All the focus of this home is on whats hidden, not the street.
A large 4 x 8 metre shed with easy street access complements the ample hardstanding for parking out front, you'll never be short of car, boat & guest parking.

Description:
IMMACULATE HOME WITH LANDSCAPED GARDENS
Perfectly situated in close proximity to shops, schools and amenities is this immaculate home set on a generous 670m2 approx parcel of land which enjoys a flourishing vegetable patch and landscaped gardens that will inspire! Inside features ducted heating, three comfortable bedrooms including Master with ceiling fan, ensuite and WIR, a spacious sunken living room with beautiful bay window and functional kitchen. The dining and second living space enjoy a north facing aspect which allows plenty of light and flows out through sliding glass doors to the rear garden. Secure car accommodation at the end of the extended driveway allows for storage of boats, cars or caravan allowing you to make the most of a seaside Bellarine Peninsula lifestyle with boating, fishing, swimming all a stone's throw away! Call for an inspection today!

Description:
Calling all Homeowners & Investors
Take note of this wonderful property offering something for all! Set on a large corner allotment of 693m2 approx., you are sure to be impressed. This solid brick veneer home offers the potential for subdivision (STCA), making it an attractive opportunity to both owner occupiers & investors alike.
Offering three generous sized bedrooms, all offering built in robes and ceiling fans. The main bedroom consists of private ensuite with corner spa bath, while remaining bedrooms utilise the second central bathroom/ laundry with separate toilet. The kitchen is equipped with ample bench space, gas cooking, dishwasher and plenty of storage. Completing the floorplan inside is a great size dining area with separate spacious lounge room.
Offering a large back yard perfect for the kids or pets to enjoy. With secure fencing offering side gate access, a single garage, garden shed and a beautiful view of the You Yangs. The front & rear gardens are currently a blank canvas, low maintenance and ready for you to put your individual touch on.
Added extras include split system in main bedroom, gas wall heater and water tank.
An ideal location within walking distance to Ash Road shopping strip and kindergarten, and close proximity to Leopold Primary School, the Leopold Community Hub and recreation facilities close by. Call today to arrange your inspection.

Description:
Relax, Entertain, Enjoy
Perched upon a block of approximately 613sqm is this incredibly tidy, low maintenance, 4 bedroom, 2 bathroom abode.
Positioned perfectly to take complete advantage of the views on offer provided by the upstairs balcony, you can see just how close you are to the ever-popular Gateway Plaza Leopold which is only a 2-minute drive away.
Extras include:
Master bedroom complete with ensuite.
Built-in-robes in all bedrooms (besides the upstairs room).
Upstairs 4th bedroom or 2nd living area.
Split-system heating/cooling.
Wood fire heater.
Undercover alfresco area perfect for entertaining in any condition.
Decked areas beside the alfresco area as well as just outside the door leading out from the dining area.
Downlights throughout.
Ceiling fan in the upstairs room.
Floating floorboards throughout.
Carpets in the living area & all bedrooms.
Tiles in the bathroom & laundry.
Double carport.
Small storage shed at the rear of the yard.

Description:
Enticing Opportunity In Central Drysdale!
Situated in the highly sought after Drysdale blue ribbon property precinct, 2/11 Carolanne Drive will not disappoint the astute buyer, downsizing retirees or the savvy investor. With minimal fuss and maximum lifestyle rewards this bright 2 bedroom unit evokes the feel of a blank canvas that is on the brink of greatness. Set back off the street, this comfortably presented home also offers the prospect of a quick and easy cosmetic revival which is sure to reward. The kitchen is the central hub of the home that opens into a spacious lounge/dining area. Additional features of the home are a single car lock up garage and a low maintenance backyard. To further enhance this irresistible opportunity, a short stroll sees you in the heart of Central Drysdale's vibrancy where the cafes, restaurants and shopping options are endless. Award winning wineries and lifestyles pursuits that the Bellarine Peninsula is renowned for are only minutes drive from this fabulous location. Opportunities like this don't come around very often, so please feel free to call me anytime to arrange an inspection at the property.

Description:
PICTURE PERFECT WITH BAY VIEWS!
This brand new luxury home features a stunning design and attention to detail, combined with protected 180 degree picture perfect bay views across Corio Bay and Port Phillip bay with a backdrop of the You Yangs. Upon entering, you will be instantly enveloped in the comforting feeling of home and an overwhelming sense of space with a grand foyer flowing through to a spacious living area leading out to the rear deck & north facing garden. Downstairs also enjoys 3 comfortable bedrooms, generous laundry and beautiful bathroom and walk-in linen storage. The reverse living floorplan has an upstairs with north facing open plan indoor outdoor living space with harmonious and seamless access onto the delightful entertaining deck with breathtaking panoramic views. The entire home is beautifully decorated in soothing neutral tones whilst the stunning designer kitchen features quality fixtures and fittings and a fantastic butlers pantry with an abundance of storage space. Other features of this amazing home include quality flooring and window furnishings, split system, ducted heating and an over sized double garage with rear drive through access. This fabulous home is truly one not to be missed!

Description:
You Could be Calling this Home..
This property has been tastefully updated and offers comfortable living for the first home buyer, young family or an opportunity to secure the perfect investment property. The instant comfort and appeal of this home, complemented by its superbly central location, will ensure this residence is a talking point amongst buyers.
Set on a generous allotment of 651m2 approx., this well-presented family home has so much to offer. Comprising three spacious bedrooms, main offering a private ensuite and ample robe space, while remaining bedrooms utilise the spacious central bathroom. The convenient layout of this floorplan incorporates an open plan with a fully updated and contemporary designed kitchen, dining and living zone at the hub of the home. The kitchen includes stone bench tops, new appliances, dishwasher, 900mm freestanding oven/cooktop, and an abundance of storage space. Furthermore, the two separate living zones provide extra space for the whole family to relax and enjoy.
Completing this ideal property is a functional, paved undercover entertaining area. The rear yard also offers space for extra garaging accessible through the drive through double garage. The lush lawn and abundance of yard space is waiting to be enjoyed by all, as well as the low maintenance garden with established fruit trees. Added features include gas ducted heating throughout, ceiling fans, spilt system cooling, just to name a few.
This home simply caters for everyone! Freshly painted inside and new timber laminate flooring throughout is sure to please both investment buyers and those looking for a new family residence. This property is every bit as good as it looks from the street. Within extremely close proximity to Leopold Primary school, Gateway Plaza, walking tracks, parks and bike trails. Public transport only a stones throw away and moments from some of the best beaches the Bellarine Peninsula has to offer. Whether you are going to live in, renovate or invest, dont miss out on this fantastic opportunity.

Description:
Rare 1 Acre Opportunity in the Heart of Drysdale!
This is your chance to secure your own private oasis, in the heart of it all! Positioned only moments to all major amenities, supermarkets, schools, and public transport on offer, be sure to act quick as this golden opportunity will not last.
The private driveway is lined with established trees and foliage, which leads you to the character filled, ranch style homestead. A full-length verandah is the most perfect place to sit and unwind, while overlooking the expansive and secure front gardens, equipped with your own private pond and offering subtle Bay views. Meticulously maintained and drenched in natural light, the home comprises a fully equipped kitchen with gas cooking, dishwasher and ample storage, while overlooking the meals area and spacious open plan living. A separate formal lounge, 3 bedrooms, the master with en-suite and walk-in-robe, the other 2 hosting built-in-robes, versatile 4th bedroom/study, family bathroom with luxe spa bath, shower and vanity and laundry complete this ideal and cleverly zoned family home.
Access to an expansive undercover entertaining area sits from the main living hub and offers seamless indoor/outdoor entertaining, while enjoying the stunning back garden views. An absolute dream for those with multiple cars, caravans, boats and all toys in between or the quintessential set up for an enviable workshop, the 9m x 9.6m garage, also equipped with its own toilet, will leave a lasting impression! Additional features of the property include; Gas log heater, 2 split systems, monitored security system, multiple water tanks, ceiling fans, café blinds, Crimsafe security doors, additional DLUG with under house storage and sub-division potential (STCA).
Perfectly private and offering the utmost tranquility, this is a once in a lifetime buy, for those who are wanting their own piece of paradise! Blink and you will miss this opportunity - Don't delay!
*All information about the property has been provided to Hayeswinckle by third parties. Hayeswinckle has not verified the information and does not warrant its accuracy or completeness. Parties should make and rely on their own enquiries in relation to this property.

Description:
The height of Clifton Springs quality lifestyle and location
Tucked away in a quiet cul-de-sac, and located on one of the high points of picturesque Clifton Springs, this impeccably-presented contemporary family home offers a delightful lifestyle - with some wonderful bay views as a bonus.
An elevated drive leads to a double lock-up garage, while a curving path bordered by a spectacular row of standard lilly-pilly trees and colourful carnations delivers you to the covered porch. At the front of the house, the master bedroom enjoys glimpses of the bay, plus a generous walk-through dressing room, and a sparkling ensuite with a separate WC.
The open-plan kitchen/lounge/dining area is an entertainer's dream, with double sliding doors accessing a north-east facing deck - the perfect spot for drinks, barbecues, or just lazing about. And the skillfully terraced garden provides an absolutely stunning backdrop to whatever alfresco activity you choose.
The galley-style kitchen offers a large Westinghouse electric oven with a 5-burner gas cooktop, an Asko dishwasher, and a large walk-in pantry connects to the compact laundry. A second entertainment/rumpus room sits adjacent to three more bedrooms, and the main bathroom offers a shower, bath and vanity, plus a separate WC. Ducted heating and cooling throughout the home ensure year-round comfort. Behind double gates at the front there's also room for a boat, trailer, or extra vehicle storage.
- Impeccably-presented family home and garden with bay views
- Ideal elevated location in quiet cul-de-sac with lock-up garage
- Master bedroom with ensuite, 3 more bedrooms, and bathroom
- Open-plan kitchen/lounge/dining to excellent deck and garden
- Second entertainment/rumpus room, walk-in pantry, and laundry
- Ceiling ducted heating and cooling throughout.

Description:
Unparalleled Design & Master Craftsmanship
The Feel:
A stunning example of modern architecture and true master craftsmanship, this exquisite residence from Riverview Building Solutions is setting the new benchmark for coastal living. Meticulous attention to detail and the highest calibre of fixtures and fittings blend with intelligent design, delivering absolute privacy and a seamless outdoor connection for premier entertaining.
The Facts:
-Architecturally designed and custom built across 4955m2 approx.
-Unparalleled craftsmanship by high-end builder - Riverview Building Solutions
-Contemporary façade blends formed concrete, Silvertop Ash and charcoal cladding
-Striking recycled beams from the Glenmaggie Bridge dating back to the early 1900s
-Sense of light and space with approx. 3m high square set ceilings throughout
-Raked ceilings with glazed divider separating main living and relaxed retreat
-Kitchen featuring 3x NEFF ovens, Highland gas hob, and QASAIR rangehood
-Dual dishwashers and sinks, 2pack custom joinery with BLUM fittings
-Discreet push to open cabinetry in butlers pantry for a wealth of hidden storage
-Expansive north facing entertaining pavilion and lawn space ideal for a pool (STCA)
-North facing bedrooms access private decks and entertaining zone with firepit
-All minor bedrooms are queen sized, all with expansive WIRs
-Palatial master suite with WIR, ensuite with freestanding bath and frameless shower
-Floor to ceiling tiling, underfloor heating and full height storage to all wet areas
-Wormy chestnut hardwood flooring and quality carpets to living and bedrooms
-2-way real wood fireplace, ducted Daikin refrigerated cooling, and heating
-Double glazed windows and doors displaying the best in German technology
-Huge formal lounge at façade, central home office, and further rumpus
-4.2m doors to 18x12m workshop, 75m2 mezzanine storage + 2 rec. rooms
-Oversized DLUG with additional storage room and internal access
-2 circular driveways ideal for trade vehicles, boats, and caravans
-50m2 guest house with luxury bathroom, euro laundry, and outdoor deck
-Full family sized kitchen with Siemens appliances and open living zone
-Lucrative holiday income and separately accessed to the main home
-Central Bellarine location, minutes to surf beaches and quality schools
-Great access to Melbourne via Ferry, or 90mins on the freeway via Geelong
The Owner Loves
"Architecturally designed to maximise light and connect seamlessly with the outdoors, the central living zones are perfect for those who love to entertain. We pride ourselves on providing world-class fixtures and fittings, and we think buyers looking for a quality home on the coast will be impressed."

Description:
Perfect Family Home. Just move in.
Upon walking into this immaculately presented home you will be presented with open entry leading to the ground level open Kitchen/ dining / living area, complete with stainless steal appliances , gas cooktop, electric oven, walk in pantry and stone benchtops. Enclosed parents retreat / theatre room for your own quiet time and 4th bedroom / study all on the ground floor. Head upstairs to the 3rd living area and balcony to sit and read the perfect book, as well as the king size master bedroom, large walk in robe and full en-suite, bedrooms 3 & 4 are complete with built in robe and a walk in robe, with central family bathroom. Add to this evaporative cooling and ducted heating, remote double lockup garage, garden shed, and outdoor entertaining area to watch the kids playing on a manicured 634m2 allotment. A must inspection.
